TEXT.BODY: Oper shr profit seven cts vs loss 12 cts Oper net profit 216,000 vs loss 401,000 Sales 21.4 mln vs 24.9 mln NOTE: Current year net excludes 142,000 dlr tax credit. Company operating in Chapter 11 bankruptcy. Reuter
